name: Cozy Farms Inc
description:
Cozy Farms Inc. is a small farm simulator set in the hills of Cozington, WV. As a Cozy Farms Inc. Farmer, you are tasked with tending to the animals. Good luck!

Some Extra Information:

- Animals are simulated in the sense they will roam randomly if their needs are met.
- Currently, their needs are hunger and thirst.
- Animals will seek out whatever items will fulfill their needs.
- Keep an eye on the emoji's above their heads to get an idea of what they want (right now you just have to worry about 2 things).
- Lack of food and water will lead to anger.
- When anger is maxed out because of neglect... well... heh...
